ComicInfo.Series: The Stand: The Night Has Come
ComicInfo.Summary: The final reckoning begins this issue, True Believers! Harold Lauder and Nadine Cross have done the dark man's bidding from afar for weeks, and now it's time for their reward...but neither one is prepared for the horrors that await them in the desert. Also, Tom Cullen plans his great escape from Vegas, but how far can one man get with an entire community against him? Unless, of course, Tom isn't alone...
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-01 19:46:40. [CVDB293233] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 12:37:12. [Issue ID 875787]
ComicInfo.Editor: Bill Rosemann,John Denning,Nicole Wiley Boose,Ralph Macchio
ComicInfo.Characters: Nadine Cross,Whitney Horgan,Carl Hough (dies),Tom Cullen,Julie Lawry,Randall Flagg,Harold Lauder,Lloyd Henreid,Paul Burlson,Barry Dorgan
